alert.note: Alert for Rich (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:18PM MDT until July 03 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RICH...NORTH CENTRAL SUMMIT AND UINTA COUNTIES... At 718 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Randolph to 10 miles east of Woodruff to 12 miles east of Evanston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Randolph, Woodruff, Robertson, Mountain View, Millburne, Fort Bridger, Almy, Altamont, Ragen, Piedmont, Leroy and Carter. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 193 and 196. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 131 and 135. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
